title: World of Warcraft+The Burning Crusade 2.4.2 WoW+TBC
description:
Games : Windows : Full Game : English
World of Warcraft+The Burning Crusade 2.4.2 WoW+TBC 

EXTRACTED EDITION 
Just run wow.exe and play (from any directory) 
Create your account (instructions below) 
Play for free online, no timelimit, no charges, no evil thoughts behind at all. 
Enjoy! 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


                                   SOLIDHANGOUT

World of Warcraft + The Burning Crusade 2.4.2 (8278) enGB 

Release info: 
FullGameClient + Expansion + Prepatched to latest patch 2.4.2 
Create your account here:  <a href="
http://solidresurrection.sytes.net/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://solidresurrection.sytes.net/</a> 
(It might take up to 10 minutes before your account becomes active) 

Simple use: 
Run wow.exe to start the game. 

Advanced use: 
We are proud to present our custom written gamelauncher 
Run Launcher.exe 
(Requires NET Framework 3.5 installed) 

Create your account and connect directly to the server! 
Absolute free of charge and no timelimit! 
Absolute virus/adware/malware free! 

Community:  <a href="
http://solidhangout.com/forums/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://solidhangout.com/forums/</a> 
(If you need any support you find that on the link above) 

Have a great time in there!

                                   SOLIDHANGOUT


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Server information 
(The server you will play on) 

Welcome to Resurrection 
A Solid(WoW) Entertainment production 

Patch supported: 2.4.x 
Estimated player capacity 3000+ 

Custom: 
Guards give honor once again, just like in old times. 
Flying mounts works all over the world. 
Soulbound removed (Happy Trade) 
Breath is disabled (Go explore areas never seen before) 
Teleporters, Portals 
No wait time for mails 
No faction limits between races 
Ingame voice chat 
Bugfixes, almost bugfree environment! 
Transports work 
Honorsystem works 
Designed/Exra Gameobjects ingame (random places) 
Broad vary of custom vendors 
Get ViP items direct ingame from NPC 
Anything missing? We create it for you! 
+Much more to come which is in development at the moment 

Constant development on other "test" servers 
(So we dont bother you when testing) 

Rates: 
Health x2 
Mana x1 
Rage x1 
Energy x1 
Quest reputation x30 
Kill reputation x15 
Honor x10 
XP x10 
QuestXP x14 
RestXP x2 
DropWhite x25 
DropGreen x10 
DropBlue x10 
DropPurple x10 
DropOrange x25 
DropArtifact x20 
DropMoney x35 
SkillChance x25 
SkillRate x15 
ArenaMultiplier x10 

Policy: 
We always prioritize your safety. 
We keep backups of everything and what we change. 
We know how important it is for you to keep your characters intact. 
We never wipe account databases. 
We prioritize your latency before capacity. 
We care about our users needs and listen to each and everyone. 
Account database auto saves every five minutes. 
(If anything happens a maximum of 5 minutes gametime is lost) 

Solid Entertainment: 
We have been serving World of Warcraft once before (for 1.5year), we took a break meanwhile a better software was developed. 
Now when we have it, we revive the long lost magic within World of Warcraft once and for all. 
We make sure to put just as much focus in our community, which will remain after WoW. 

Community: 
In this server and forums we have a relaxing, fun and friendly environment for the whole family. 
Possible to make new friends in a controlled environment. 
It is with us you will have the ultimate World of Warcraft experience. 
We customize the game as you wish it to be. 

Thank you for reading. Hope to see you in there soon! 



Yours sincerely 
The Solid Team
